name: Bryan Lordeus

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: I can assist with the creation and development of website ideas, with a particular focus on the user interface and implementing functionality where necessary.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: With over 10 years of experience, I can design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Copy and Content Writing
services.description: As a professional writer, I can craft compelling written material that effectively resonates with a particular audience and improves brand engagement.

resume.tagline: Front End Developer | Graphic Designer | Writer
resume.description: Experienced front-end developer and web designer with 4 years of expertise in crafting and editing interactive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Proficient in graphic design and writing, I am dedicated to creating seamless user experiences and bringing websites to life with a keen eye for detail and creativity.

experiences.position: Copywriter at Purple Tree Coaching & Consulting
experiences.bullets: Proofread content and wrote copy for social media channels and e-marketing materials., Enhanced online visibility through SEO copywriting.
Edited the client's website using Squarespace.,  Optimizing website performance and improving user experience.
Developed copy and blog content for the website., Created visual content for Instagram and Facebook accounts.

experiences.position: Web & App Designer at Riverside Church
experiences.bullets: Prevented website crashes and errors by updating the front-end code and troubleshooting issues using HTML and CSS., Designed engaging and responsive landing pages using WordPress.

education.universityPara: English, with a concentration in Professional Writing, Rhetoric, and Technology
